comments.body:
Are `__arm__` and `__arm64__` exclusive? If we don't know show sure maybe consider
```suggestion
#   if defined(__arm__) || defined (__arm64__)
#      define R__BYTESWAP
#   endif
#   if defined (__arm64__)
#      define R__B64
#   endif
```

I believe they are exclusive, see e.g. how we use them [here](https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/core/unix/src/TUnixSystem.cxx#L932-L935), it seems that `__arm64__` does not imply `__arm__`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +300,304 @@#      define R__BYTESWAP
#   endif
#   if defined (__arm64__)
#      define R__BYTESWAP
#      define R__B64      /* enable when 64 bit machine */
